issue.title: [C++] Improve csv writer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15763](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15763). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Profiling shows for string inputs, csv writer spends most of the time in counting quotes for every string, this can probably be improved by checking quotes before-ahead in batch.
For numeric inputs, the casting (number -> string) dominates the performance.
